name: Blubbies: The Odyssey 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Help the Blubbies on their journey through the sea! These cute little creatures can be a bit clueless sometimes, so they'll need your guidance to face the dangers and the enemies found under the sea.

Platform : Mobil or Tablet / Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players : 1

Producer : Marie CHAINE
Game Design : Clara LEGENTIL
Game Art : Delphine JANNOT, Laetitia RODRIGUEZ-LEFEVRE, Tiana RAJOHARISON, Diane KOEU
Game Programming : Adrien TAPHALOT
Game Design & Programming : Flavien MARIANACCI, Dorian MILLIERE
Music & Sound Design : Lou CORROYER
